column4: presumable, the release of hoary is why i am no longer receiving updates?

then change to breezy once it is out

now i have no vt switching while gdm is active
hehe... i had to remove the Generic Mouse line in xorg.conf and then it still wouldnt work unless i chose the Gnome session isntead of System Default
if you find a solution, msgserv me (or msg on forums, or or or, hrh)
did you have to change the session when you login? i dont even know what i means really
i had to go to a failsafe once, then to gnome after that, now it is set to "last" and it works as before
ok, so you had to fiddle with that too
yeah, quite similar here and there
failsafe means it won't run your system > preferences > sessions, settings
not that it helps you now any, just so you'll know what it means
